resource: 1001620.description=1.9% APR includes 36 monthly payments of $28.60 per $1000 borrowed. 1.9% APR includes 48 monthly payments of $21.65 per $1000 borrowed. 1.9% APR includes 60 monthly payments of $17.48 per $1000 borrowed. For example 10% down--down payment varies with credit. Available through Toyota Financial Services to qualified Tier 1 + (plus), Tier 1, Tier 2 and Tier 3 credit customers. Available on a new 2011 Avalon purchased out of dealer stock by midnight 12/28/2011. Offers cannot be combined. See your Toyota dealer for details. 1001620.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1001620.vtc=true 1001620.derived=false
